ignoreCommand: bash -c 'BASE_BRANCH=${BASE_BRANCH:-master}; REPO_URL="https://github.com/${VERCEL_GIT_REPO_OWNER}/${VERCEL_GIT_REPO_SLUG}.git"; if [ -n "$VERCEL_GIT_PULL_REQUEST_ID" ]; then git fetch --depth=1 "$REPO_URL" "$BASE_BRANCH" && git diff --quiet FETCH_HEAD HEAD -- sparkle/src; else [ -n "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" ] && git diff --quiet "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA" -- sparkle/src || exit 1; fi'
